## FrameProvider class

Handles rollup of draw calls and incremental updating of interaction handlers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FrameProvider implements IFrameProvider 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IFrameProvider](./core.iframeprovider.md)
